metadata: (info { (description "Impartial game played with the 4x4 board full of one kind of piece. A number of \"folk art\" versions of the game with a wooden board and marbles were found on the web. Computer program versions are also available.The 4x4 game has been completely solved and it is a second player win.") (aliases {"Bulo"}) (rules "A player may remove one or more adjacent pieces from a row or column. The loser is the person who takes the last piece off the board.") (id "1824") (source "<a href=\"https: (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/space/blocking") (author "Piet Hein") (credit "Eric Piette") (date "1949") } ) (graphics { (no Sunken) (board Colour Phase0 (colour DarkBrown)) (board Colour OuterEdges (colour VeryDarkBrown)) (board Colour InnerEdges (colour VeryDarkBrown)) (player Colour Shared (colour VeryDarkBrown)) (show Symbol "disc" (sites Board) fillColour:(colour Brown) edgeColour:(colour Brown) scale:0.9) }) (ai "TacTix_ai" )
